abstract: New York City Public Advocate Bill de Blasio is launching investigation into city’s responsiveness to requests made under New York State’s Freedom of Information Law out of concern that agencies are taking too long to release public information.
snippet: The New York City Public Advocate announced on Wednesday that he was launching an investigation into the city’s responsiveness to requests made under the state’s Freedom of Information Law.
lead_paragraph: The New York City Public Advocate announced on Wednesday that he was launching an investigation into the city’s responsiveness to requests made under the state’s Freedom of Information Law.

headline.main: De Blasio Pushes on Information Requests
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Pushes on Information Requests
headline.seo: Public Advocate to Investigate Freedom of Information Law Compliance
